sentences.english: Time is respected by not wasting it.
sentences.chinese: 不浪費時間是值得尊重的。

sentences.english: I kno , they Want me to study hard and not to aste time.
sentences.chinese: 我明白他們想讓我努力學習，不要浪費時間。

sentences.english: It is hardly surprising if students sometimes find this kind of make-believe question a waste of their time.
sentences.chinese: 不難看到，學生有時覺得這類問題是在浪費時間。

sentences.english: Mike: Making dumplings is time-consuming, but it's fun.
sentences.chinese: 包餃子很費時間，但也是一種樂趣。

sentences.english: "Thank you for sending me a copy of your book; I'll waste no time reading it. " —Moses Hadas.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您送我的大作樣書，我不會浪費時間拜讀的。

sentences.english: As potential applicants have noted, it takes time and energy to prepare for the examination.
sentences.chinese: 一些報考的學生說，考研既費時間又耗精力。

sentences.english: The cost relates directly to the amount of time spent on the project.
sentences.chinese: 這個項目的成本與所費時間有直接關係。

sentences.english: The treatment of cracks requires a lot of labors and time, which could increase project cost and delay the construction period.
sentences.chinese: 而且裂縫的處理費工費時，增加工程成本並延長工期。

sentences.english: Let’s say we discovered what the main online time wasters are.
sentences.chinese: 發現你在線浪費時間的地方，你會很震驚，像我一樣。

sentences.english: Envy is a waste of time. You already have all you need.
sentences.chinese: 忌妒是在浪費時間，你已經擁有你所需要的了。

sentences.english: Fourth, carpe diem means don't waste time.
sentences.chinese: 第四，及時行樂意謂著不浪費時間。

sentences.english: I'm trying to count the stars. You're wasting your time!
sentences.chinese: 我正在數星星，你純粹是在浪費時間。

sentences.english: Li Xiaoping said his clothing report takes nearly a year.
sentences.chinese: 李曉平表示，他的服裝報告費時近一年。

sentences.english: It will be time and money thrown away.
sentences.chinese: 這將是浪費時間和金錢。

sentences.english: At many companies, the annual meeting is a waste of time because exhibitionists turn it into a sideshow.
sentences.chinese: 在許多公司股東會只是浪費時間，因爲大多流於形式。

sentences.english: Testing using a real printer is costly and time consuming.
sentences.chinese: 使用實際打印機進行測試的成本高而且費時間。

definition: many and complicated/mired in minor details
saving/to save/to use sparingly/to cut down on
time-consuming/to take a period of (x amount of time)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
to expend a great deal of effort
